eg.syntax

Class SyntaxUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.syntax.SyntaxUtils

  • public class SyntaxUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Static methods to search for text elements

      Returns if the specified position is found inside a section of text in quotes

      Returns the boolean that indicates if the portion of text starting at the specified position and spanning the specified length does not adjoin to a letter or a digit at the start and/or at the end

      Returns the boolean value that indicates if the character that follows the specified position is not a letter or a digit

      Returns the next position, relative to the specified position, of the specified string toSearch that is not preceded with a backslash

      Returns the length of a word that starts at the specified position and ends with one of the characters in the specified endChars

                             char[] endChars)

      • lastBlockStart

        public static int lastBlockStart(java.lang.String text,
                                 int pos,
                                 java.lang.String blockStart,
                                 java.lang.String blockEnd)
        Returns the position of the last block start before the specified position
        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position
        blockStart - the start of a block
        blockEnd - the end of a block
        Returns:
        the position of the last block start. -1 if a block end is closer than a block start or if no block start is found

        Parameters:
        text - the text
        pos - the position in the text
        blockStart - the start of a block
        blockEnd - the end of a block
        Returns:
        the position of the next block end. -1 if a block start is closer than a block end or if no block end is found
